scripts.csv2json: csvtojson  model/stage1.csv > model/stage1.json  && csvtojson model/stage3.csv > model/stage3.json && csvtojson model/stage5.csv > model/stage5.json && csvtojson model/stage1updated.csv > model/stage1updated.json && csvtojson model/stage2updated.csv > model/stage2updated.json && csvtojson model/stage3updated.csv > model/stage3updated.json && csvtojson model/stage4updated.csv > model/stage4updated.json

name: genorec-engine
description: This is the recommendation engine for genomics visualization recommendation tool.
author: Aditeya Pandey <aditeyapandey@gmail.com> (http://www.aditeyapandey.com/)
